title: Aviator Irelia's Splash Art in shop right now in the featured section looks wrong.
body: It seems to be an outdated splash or maybe a splash from some other region.

replies.body:
Hey FIuffCow,

Thanks for the report!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=hqJjk6cr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-30T23:16:57.700+0000)
>
> Hey FIuffCow,
> 
> Thanks for the report!

This is off topic but will the harrowing event start tonight?
Slayer/Zombie skins will be available later this patch, as well as legacy skins. We haven't announced a specific date for the event.
Yup, that'd be the original splash lol.
Oh well I didn't even think it looked bad xD! I just could definitely tell it was outdated :p
Last kennen skin was 2011 can he please get some love
